0.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| summarize count()
0.title: Finished Deployments

1.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| summarize count() , by:{task.outcome}
1.title: Deployment Status

10.content:
### Releases

This section provides a comprehensive overview of GitLab release activity, including the number of created and deployed releases, deployment statuses, environment-specific release metrics, and details of the 20 most recent deployments.

---

11.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize {
  Started = takeMin(if(event.status == "started", toTimestamp(start_time))),
  Finished = takeMax(if(event.status == "finished", toTimestamp(end_time))),
  Status = takeAny(if(event.status == "finished",task.outcome)),
  JobRunUrl = takeAny(deployment.url.full),
  JobRunId = takeAny(ext.deployment.job.id)
}, by: {task.id,vcs.repository.name,vcs.ref.base.name,deployment.environment.name,vcs.repository.url.full}
| filter isNotNull(Finished)
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| join [fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "build" and event.status == "finished" | fields task.id,cicd.pipeline.run.id, task.name , task.outcome.failure.reason, task.queued.duration, task.retry,ext.task.stage],kind: leftOuter,on:{left[JobRunId] == right[task.id]},prefix:"j."
| fields 
Environment = upper(deployment.environment.name),
Status ,
Duration=Finished-Started,
Started,
Finished,
JobName = j.task.name,
JobQueuedDuration = j.task.queued.duration,
JobRunUrl ,
JobRetry = j.task.retry,
JobFailureReason = if(isNotNull(j.task.outcome.failure.reason),j.task.outcome.failure.reason,else: "n/a"),
Project = vcs.repository.name,
PipelineRunId = j.cicd.pipeline.run.id,
Repository = vcs.repository.url.full
| sort Finished desc
| limit 20
11.title: Deployments | last 20

12.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize {
  started = takeMin(if(event.status == "started", toTimestamp(start_time))),
  finished = takeMax(if(event.status == "finished", toTimestamp(end_time))),
  status = takeAny (if(event.status == "finished",task.outcome))

}, by: {task.id,deployment.environment.name, vcs.repository.url.full,vcs.repository.name}
| filter isNotNull(finished)
| filter status!="canceled"
| fieldsAdd duration = finished - started
| filter isNotNull(duration)
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| summarize p50 = median(duration), by: {upper(deployment.environment.name), vcs.repository.name}
| sort p50 desc | limit 5
12.title: Deployment Duration ( p50 ) | top 5

13.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "release" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" | fields vcs.ref.base.name,ext.project.id,vcs.repository.name, release.name,release.description, start_time,vcs.repository.url.full
| join [fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished" | fields task.outcome,vcs.ref.base.name,ext.project.id, ext.deployment.job.id, deployment.environment.name, end_time,vcs.repository.url.full ],on:{vcs.ref.base.name,ext.project.id}
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(right.deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| summarize count()
13.title: Releases deployed

14.title: Release Deployments Status

15.title: Release Deployments by Environment

16.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| summarize failureRate = if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(task.outcome=="failure")) / toDouble(count())*100)
16.title: Failure Rate

17.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize {
  started = takeMin(if(event.status == "started", toTimestamp(start_time))),
  finished = takeMax(if(event.status == "finished", toTimestamp(end_time))),
  status = takeAny (if(event.status == "finished",task.outcome))

}, by: {task.id,deployment.environment.name, vcs.repository.url.full}
| fieldsAdd duration = finished - started
| filter isNotNull(finished)
| filter status!="canceled"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| makeTimeseries p50 = median(duration),p90 = percentile(duration,90),time: finished
17.title: Deployment Duration

18.content:
### GitLab Deployment Pulse

This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of deployment activities within GitLab pipelines, enabling engineering and DevOps teams to monitor, analyze, and optimize their software delivery processes. 

---

19.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize {
  Started = takeMin(if(event.status == "started", toTimestamp(start_time))),
  Finished = takeMax(if(event.status == "finished", toTimestamp(end_time))),
  Status = takeAny(if(event.status == "finished",task.outcome)),
  JobRunUrl = takeAny(deployment.url.full),
  JobRunId = takeAny(ext.deployment.job.id)
}, by: {task.id,vcs.repository.name,vcs.ref.base.name,deployment.environment.name,vcs.repository.url.full}
| filter isNotNull(Finished)
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| join [fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "build" and event.status == "finished" | fields task.id,task.outcome.failure.reason],kind: leftOuter,on:{left[JobRunId] == right[task.id]},prefix:"j."
| filter isNotNull(j.task.outcome.failure.reason)
| summarize Count=count(), by:{j.task.outcome.failure.reason}
| sort Count desc
| limit 5
19.title: Failure Reasons | top 5

2.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| summarize Count = count() , by:{upper(deployment.environment.name)}
| sort Count desc
2.title: Finished Deployments by Environment

20.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize {
  Started = takeMin(if(event.status == "started", toTimestamp(start_time))),
  Finished = takeMax(if(event.status == "finished", toTimestamp(end_time))),
  Status = takeAny(if(event.status == "finished",task.outcome)),
  JobRunUrl = takeAny(deployment.url.full),
  JobRunId = takeAny(ext.deployment.job.id)
}, by: {task.id,vcs.repository.name,vcs.ref.base.name,deployment.environment.name,vcs.repository.url.full}
| filter isNotNull(Finished)
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| join [fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "build" and event.status == "finished" | fields task.id,task.outcome.failure.reason],kind: leftOuter,on:{left[JobRunId] == right[task.id]},prefix:"j."
| filter isNotNull(j.task.outcome.failure.reason) and j.task.outcome.failure.reason == "deployment_rejected"
| summarize Count=count(), by:{j.task.outcome.failure.reason}
| sort Count desc
| limit 5
20.title: Failure caused by acceptance rejection

21.content:
#### Share feedback 
We welcome your feedback on this dashboard to help us improve and deliver a more effective observability solution, ensuring it provides maximum value to your software development lifecycle and delivery processes. Please post a comment here: [Feedback channel for CI/CD Pipeline Observability](https://community.dynatrace.com/t5/Platform-Engineering/Feedback-channel-for-CI-CD-Pipeline-Observability/m-p/269193/highlight/true#M1) (Dynatrace Community).
#
---

#### Additional resources
**Pipeline Observability**
* [Observability throughout the software development lifecycle increases delivery performance](https://www.dynatrace.com/news/blog/observability-throughout-the-software-development-lifecycle/) (Blog Post)
* [Concepts](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/pipeline-observability-concepts) (Docs)

**Software Development Lifecycle Events**
* [Ingest SDLC events](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/sdlc-events) (Docs)
* [SDLC event specification]() (Docs)
#
---

#### About this dashboard

Preview Release v0.1.0, [Origin](https://github.com/Dynatrace/dynatrace-configuration-as-code-samples)

3.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| makeTimeseries Count = count() , by:{upper(deployment.environment.name)}
3.title: Deployment Frequency

4.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize {
  started = takeMin(if(event.status == "started", toTimestamp(start_time))),
  finished = takeMax(if(event.status == "finished", toTimestamp(end_time))),
  status = takeAny (if(event.status == "finished",task.outcome))
}, by: {task.id,vcs.repository.url.full,deployment.environment.name}
| filter isNotNull(finished)
| filter status != "canceled"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| fieldsAdd duration = finished - started
| summarize p50 = median(duration), p90 = percentile(duration,90)
4.title: Deployment Duration | p50

5.query:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize {
  started = takeMin(if(event.status == "started", toTimestamp(start_time))),
  finished = takeMax(if(event.status == "finished", toTimestamp(end_time))),
  status = takeAny (if(event.status == "finished",task.outcome))
}, by: {task.id,vcs.repository.url.full,deployment.environment.name}
| filter isNotNull(finished)
| filter status!="canceled"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| fieldsAdd duration = finished - started
| summarize p50 = median(duration), p90 = percentile(duration,90)
5.title: Deployment Duration | p90

6.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "release" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "created"
| summarize count()
6.title: Releases created

7.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| summarize Count = count() , by:{vcs.repository.name}
| sort Count desc
7.title: Deployments by Project

8.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| filter event.status == "finished" and task.outcome == "failure"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| summarize Count = count() , by:{ upper(deployment.environment.name),vcs.repository.name}
| sort Count desc | limit 5
8.title: Error-prone Deployments | top 5

9.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "release"  and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"| fields vcs.ref.base.name,ext.project.id,vcs.repository.name, release.name,release.description, start_time,vcs.repository.url.full, release.url.full
| join [fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab"  and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished" | fields task.outcome,vcs.ref.base.name,ext.project.id, ext.deployment.job.id, deployment.environment.name, end_time,vcs.repository.url.full ],on:{vcs.ref.base.name,ext.project.id}
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Project) 
| filter in(right.deployment.environment.name,$Environment)
| fields 
ReleaseName=release.name,
ReleaseDescription = release.description,
Status = right.task.outcome,
Environment = upper(right.deployment.environment.name),
ReleaseTag = vcs.ref.base.name,
Finished = right.end_time,
Project = vcs.repository.name,
ReleaseUrl = release.url.full ,
Repository = vcs.repository.url.full
| sort Finished desc | limit 20
9.title: Release Deployments | last 20

variables.input:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize projects = collectDistinct(vcs.repository.url.full)
| expand projects
| sort projects

fetch events | filter event.provider == "gitlab" and event.type == "deployment" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.category == "task"
| summarize env = collectDistinct(deployment.environment.name)
| expand env
| sort env
